briefTitle: Chloroprocaine 3% Gel Eye Drop as Topical Anestheticsin Phacoemulsification.
officialTitle: A Prospective, Observer-masked, Randomized Clinical Trial to Investigate and Compare the Clinical Efficacy of Chloroprocaine 3% Gel and Tetracaine 0.5% Eye Drop as Topical Anestheticsin Phacoemulsification.
summary: Randomized clinical trial, multicenter, two-armed, to investigate and compare the clinical efficacy of chloroprocaine 3% gel and tetracaine 0.5% eye drop as topical anestheticsin phacoemulsification. This prospective, observer masked, randomised, controlled, equivalence phase 3 study will be conducted in approximately 4 European Countries. Sintetica intends to perform a phase 3 study on patients undergoing cataract surgery to assess the safety and efficacy of topical anaesthesia using chloroprocaine gel.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants in Each Treatment Group With a Successful Surface Anesthesia
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Before Intra Ocular Lens (IOL) implantation surgery.
